#summary The navigator.buildID property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-mozilla

== Values ==

The `navigator.buildID` property returns a string.

[BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns the date your browser was compiled, followed by an internal build number.  Example: `"2007051502"`

This property is read-only.
